Coco Pencil
Pencil Skirt
HKD 1,400
Buy
or
Customize

Tailored for a closer fit this skirt is designed to flaunt your curves.

It accentuates all the right bits whilst visually flattering your stomach area. The simple lines are chic and glamorous and never out of style. Killer heels a must.

Fabric & Care

Viscose/polyester/elastane crepe for ultimate breathability, drape, softness. and easy care.

Twisted yarns provide extra stretch and comfort. Faux leather option also has inherent stretch in the fabric.

Crepe fabric - machine wash cold, delicate. Dry cleanable. Do not tumble dry, low iron. Faux leather cold wash only, do not tumble dry or iron.

Accessories

Accessories not included by default, to add a belt please customize this dress
